feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 2:53AM AKST until November 27 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches is expected. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph may reduce visibilities down to half mile or less at times.

entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT: MANDATORY WOOD BURNING CURTAILMENT IN EFFECT... entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 26 at 8:34AM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor is forecast to continue a slow fall while remaining within Moderate Flood stage through the middle of next week. Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Moderate flood impacts.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 26 at 8:28AM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Deland affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River at DeLand is forecast to slowly fall while remaining within Minor Flood Stage this weekend and into next week. Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Minor flood impacts.
